definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Glowing candles burn our stirring passion;
sentences.chinese: 火红的烛焰燃烧着我们火红的激情。

sentences.english: Glowing candles burn our stirring passion;
sentences.chinese: 火红的烛焰燃烧着我们火红的激情。

sentences.english: The youngster has flaming red hair that refuses to lie flat.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻人有火红的头发不肯放平。

sentences.english: All the Weasleys have bright red hair and freckles .
sentences.chinese: 韦斯莱家人都有火红的头发和雀斑。

sentences.english: The evening sky flamed with red and orange.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚天空的颜色是一片火红和橘黄相间。
火红的郁金香，蓝色的玫瑰。

sentences.english: And climbed up to its flaming flue.
sentences.chinese: 沿着火红的烟道，爬上山岗。
火红年，恭喜发财贺新年。

sentences.english: I will wear the fiery-red mini skirt which you love most.
sentences.chinese: 我今天会换上你喜欢的火红辣妹装。

sentences.english: We stood on the high ridge, looking down on the flaming expanses of broomcorn.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在高岗上，俯察那片火红的高粱地。

sentences.english: The red flowers in the distant mountain! Kapok?
sentences.chinese: 前方远山上火红的花朵是木棉吗？

sentences.english: Perhaps under the fiery red lantern India lining roof is they tonight the nuptial chamber.
sentences.chinese: 或许火红的灯笼印衬下的房顶就是他们今晚的洞房吧。

sentences.english: A study on the genus Rhododendron L. subsection Neriiflora Sleumer in China.
sentences.chinese: 中国杜鹃花属火红杜鹃花亚组的研究。

sentences.english: Mr. Wilson got a well-paid easy job just because of his bright red hair.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊先生因一头火红的头发而得到一份肥差。

sentences.english: At night, you can watch the fire-red glowing lava tumble down the side of the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 在夜间可以看到火红的炙热的熔岩顺着山坡缓缓而下。

definition: (dialect) intensity of the fire (in cooking, kiln firing etc)
